title: Why Tamil Nadu Finance Minister Palanivel Thiagarajan briefly switched from Tamil to English during Budget speech - The Indian Express
content:
1. Why Tamil Nadu Finance Minister Palanivel Thiagarajan briefly switched from Tamil to English during Budget speech  The Indian Express
  2. Work to identify beneficiaries for basic income to women on: Finance Minister  The New Indian Express
  3. TN Budget 2022: Will file report on actions taken over finance panel's recommendations, says finance min  India Today
  4. Tamil Nadu finance minister Palanivel Thiagarajan presents budget for 2022-23  Hindustan Times

description: While the Finance Minister highlighted the major initiatives and schemes of this government in Tamil, he elaborated on the aggregate fiscal position in English.
